  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBean
    Replaced by CLIBeanSpec.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigBeanBase
    Replaced by ConfigBeanSpec.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigUtil.resolveMessage(Optional<ResourceBundle>, String, String, Object...)
    Use I18nUtil.resolveText(Optional, String, String, Object...) instead.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigUtil.resolveMessage(Optional<ResourceBundle>, CmdLineException)
    This method is now obsolete.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable.stringConverter()
    Use the annotation @StringConversion instead.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.NullStringConverter
    Now obsolete.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.PreferencesBean
    Replaced by PreferencesBeanSpec.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SessionBean
    Replaced by SessionBeanSpec.
    org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SystemProperty.stringConverter()
    Use the annotation @StringConversion instead.
